body.description: Design Updated January 2024. The smaller 6x9 250 paged travel size is also available. *Please note that this is a planner/workbook with light guides. You can see examples of interior pages on storyfolk.ca. If you are planning on writing a fantasy series, there is a series-add-on-edition as well. Hello fellow storyteller, and welcome to the land of story crafting! I created this 200 paged Fantasy Novel Planner to not only help & motivate writers to complete a solid manuscript, but lightly guide them through the entire novel development process from brainstorming their title and first line, to releasing their book out into the world.The planner is filled with prompts, questions, worksheets, checklists, outlines, and tips. It is a workbook, so it’s up to you to fill in the pages with your ideas. By the end, you will have a solid foundation to build on while drafting, and a lovely keepsake of your writing journey.What's Included:Fundamentals: Title, Hook, Ideal Reader Profile, and MoreDry Plotting: Loose Plot Structure, 3 Acts, Beginning, Ending, Character & Subplot ArcsCharacter Profiles: 6 Primary Characters Profiles, 8 Secondary Character Profiles, Character Building PromptsVillain Profiles: 3 Villain ProfilesMagic System: Limitations, Types...etcWorld Building: Map, Significant Locations, Prompts, Creatures...etcChapter Outlines: Fits up to 42 chapters (1 page each), Romance Beats, Story TimelineDrafting: Creativity Fuel Tips, Word-Count Goal Tracker, First Line, First PageEditing: Common Overused Words & a Checklist For Copy & Structure, Story TrendsBeta Testing: Tips & Management, Fix-It ChecklistBonus Sections: Query Checklist, Query Builder, Query Tracker & Release Prep, Budget Tracking, Arc ReadersAnd way more! Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift. The recipient loves it and says it looks really helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for In-Progress Writers
reviews.reviewText: This little planner really blew me away.I was expecting your average writing planner, but that is certainly not what I received. This planner not only inspired me to write but made my plot-forming and worldbuilding much easier. I am more than satisfied with this product. I highly recommend it to ANYONE who is struggling to move forward in a novel or writing project and needs some extra motivation (or for anyone looking to start!)Can't wait to keep working with my planner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Helpful to keep me organized while writing a fantasy novel. I wish it had more map space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This book has all the bells and whistles! More comprehensive than most planners. Can't wait to start plotting my novel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well organized / Useful
reviews.reviewText: This is a notebook wirh few prompts, but visual Cues (skulls to rate the evilness of your villain / or other characters), plenty of space to flesh out the characters, and other details. It's like using a notebook you'd use for school but the pages are already organized for you, just fill in the blank, plug in your ideas, (insert cliché writers quip here). Useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Novel Planner
reviews.reviewText: I really loved this planner. It helped me organize my thoughts and get them written down. It encouraged brainstorming and allowed me to develop my story in greater detail. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Large and low quality paper- interesting content
reviews.reviewText: This planner is quite large. I put it in comparison to an A5 notebook. I was expecting something journal sized which I could carry easily with me. The paper quality is also really low. You can see through the pages. And if you write in it I expect that you would see pen.The content seems really well thought out. I like that almost every page has something useful on it. I really want to like this, but the flaws might bother me too much to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fab book with almost everything I needed! The designer and owner of the book was happy to help when I messaged on Instagram too! Really well designed, well layed out and thought out book.

El producto ha llegado perfecto y es tal cómo se describe en la descripción. Tenía muchas ganas de que llegara pero una vez lo he tenido, casi no lo he utilizado porque era un producto demasiado organizado para una mente tan desorganizada como la mía… simplemente no era para mi pero el producto es bueno
